info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 12:13AM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MDT/315 AM CDT/ EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and western Texas, including the following counties, in southeast New Mexico, Lea. In western Texas, Andrews and Gaines. * WHEN...Until 215 AM MDT /315 AM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1211 AM MDT /111 AM CDT/, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Up to 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hobbs, Eunice, Nadine, Monument, Eunice Airport, Humble City, Lea County Regional Airport, Oil Center, Industrial Airpark, Knowles, Paynes Corner, Gaines County Park and Loop.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
